channel.title: Aurora and Boy
channel.description: Recent content on Aurora and Boy

item.title: If I Were 19
item.description: In 2014-09, I went to college in Nanjing city of Jiangsu province. After I graduated from college when it was 2018-06, I choosed to work in the third-party logistic, which is not suitable for me. This is not smart choice. I should use the custom domain.
